description: Fixed the tuning (Now in Open C as it was written), Fixed the intro riff, removed an unnecessary third guitar, transposed all parts to a place where they make more sense for the tuning, fixed the rhythm guitar rhythm in the chorus, fixed the slide up and down in the outro, cleaned up a lot of the notation(several linked 8th notes instead of a half note, etc), add palm mute notation to the appropriate parts.
title: Life
